header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Parenting, Korean approach to parenting, school systems, buying gifts for children, Facebay, furnishing houses, trains, school trips, cooking, work shifts.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, complaining, advising, requesting, anecdote telling
